EVR1001H - Honors Introduction to Enviro.name: EVR1001H - Honors Introduction to Environmental Science

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Environmental science and environmental systems in the context of real places, real people, real problems, and real data.

EVR3085 - Interdisciplinary Research Met.name: EVR3085 - Interdisciplinary Research Methods for Environmental Studies

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Junior standing, complete equivalent of UCF Science and Math GEP.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An overview of the approaches taken by different disciplines to address regional, national, and global environmental issues.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Environmental Studies Major in graduating semester, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: In their graduating semester, majors reflect on their learning, engage in research projects, prepare an e-portfolio documenting their skills, competencies, and academic career for post-graduation plans.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Environmental science and environmental systems in the context of real places, real people, real problems and real data.
